name: ide-ruby
description: Atom-IDE support for ruby language.  Most of the functionality comes from https://github.com/kwerle/ruby_language_server

dockerPath.description: Absolute path to the docker command (restart for effect)

imageName.description: Ruby language server docker image to run (was mtsmfm/language_server - restart for effect)

lintLevel.description: What level of lint do you want to see (restart for effect)?

atomCommands.ide-ruby:help: Provides help information and descriptions of commands.

readme:
## Overview

Virtually all the functionality of this package comes from [ruby_language_server](https://github.com/kwerle/ruby_language_server).

## Requirements

  - You must have [docker](https://www.docker.com/) installed
  - You must have really low expectations or be willing to help add features

## Features

  - Very limited completion suggestions.
  - Outline view
  - Jump to definition
  - Linting

## FAQ

> Why bother?

I'm just trying to get the ball rolling.  

> Why does this crash?

Do you have docker installed?  Is the path /usr/local/bin/docker?  You can tweak that in the settings...
